page.title: 20LIVING IN KILWINNING
page.content: The area has one important hoteL. Along the main street there are cafes, restaurants-one ITALIAN and one CHINESE, public houses, betting shops, video, hairdressing salons some uni-sex, and fashion stores.The ORANGE LODGE PREMISES holds whist drives dances and discos for peole who belong to that order.The MASONIC LODGE has evenings for the masons.The BINGO hall was destroyed by fire but plans are in hand to rebuild. Dramatic and musical entertainment are held in churches and church halls.
